to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: switching to testing at install?
body:
Hello list,
When I install, i have to install stable, then use ssh to edit sources.list, and change to testing. then update, and dist-upgrade again.
This is rather slow on my connection. Is there any way to switch to testing at install?

Thanks,
~~TheCreator~~
[My programs don't have bugs; just randomly added features]
